help: Look at something in the room
Talk to the people around you

rooms.name: The Catacombs, Under the City
rooms.description: It's dark. It smells like what you might imagine a catacombs to smell like. It's... damp? Are catacombs damp or dry? Maybe it's supposed to be dry, but it's damp and that is a sign of some water seeping in, which gives you a clue about an exit some where. Hard to tell, it's dark. Anyway, here's an abnormally large rat.

enemies.name: An Abnormally Large Rat
enemies.description: Probably about the size of a cat, but distinctly rat-shaped. It wouldn't make a good pet, so you'll probably have to kill it.

messages.not_here: There is nothing like that here
messages.unknown: I don't understand. Use 'help' to get a list of valid commands
